name: Ascension (dominic-griffith)
description:
Ascension: You are lost in the mountains with nothing but a grapple and some rope. Make your way to the peak as quickly as possible to search for a way out before it gets too dark.

Controls:
right click - grapple
wsad - move
shift - sprint
space - jump
crtl - crouch

Assets:
Grappling Hook - Leafdroid
PolygonNature - Synty Studios
Ultimate Sound FX Bundle - Sidearm Studios
Footsteps Sound Pack - Cafofo
